import { useState ,useEffect } from 'react'; import Cart from './Cart'; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; function Header() { const [show,setshow] = useState(false); useEffect( () => { const handleScrolls = () => { if(window.scrollY >= 200){ setshow(true); }else{ setshow(false); } } window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScrolls); return () => { window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScrolls); } },[]) return (

  • Blog
  • Contacts

)};
); } export default Header;
